article_title: 'I worry every second': Mother of only British hostage in Gaza fears for her life

article_title: 'I worry every second': Mother of only British hostage in Gaza fears for her life
sentence: More  than  44,500  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  response  to  the  7  October  attack,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
